vsParam:
A different world... OK, I largely understand the situation.
Right, I haven't introduced myself yet.

My name is Sterkenburg Cranach.
I'm a knight from the Kingdom of "Arland".

Sterken... burg, no. Ster...
kenbu... Sterl... Ouch, I bit my tongue!
That's a mouthful, right? So, Please call meâ€”

Ah, this rolls off the tongue!
Nice to meet you, Stern!

... Someone used to call me that.
But, if possible, please call me Sterk. Thanks.

I prefer not to go by my family name...
If possible, please call me Sterk. Thanks.

Sterk, right! Never did I imagine that I'd run into a knight from
another world... Hmm, so great! I'm so touched, ah ah ah!!

What!? C-calm down, Cresson!
I'm so sorry! This guy always wants to be a knight!

But I can't leave the King's City for too long because of work.
If possible, I wish to go back to my world at once...

S-sorry... We haven't found the
way to send you back.
Uh... Hmm, what should I do?

Ah, in this case,
why don't you stay in the Academy for now!?

We have the Academy Guard. Kind of like knights.
I'm sure the Guard can help you!

Maybe you could find something there,
and I'll help you, too! What do you think?

I see... Then I shall temporarily assist
with the security work of the Academy.
Great! Glad to have you with us!!

Glad to join your team. If there's anything I could do
for you, come look for me at anytime.

I was a bodyguard to alchemists in my world.
I should be able to help you.

Thanks! Hee hee, you seem very reliable!
Nice to meet you, Sterk!
